name: Glitch - The Maze That Never Ends
name_original: Glitch - The Maze That Never Ends
description:
Glitch - The Game That Never Ends is the final update of the game glitch , some previous versions were also there here are a list of updates and game name and game information at bottom of the page!

If you somehow found an exit, don't leave .... The game has been made so that if collision on certain objects are done, the game makes the route to be other but you need to find a wall in which you WON'T COLLIDE but don't find your way to break the map and the game is made for BREAKING if you are smart enough , you must find it at the place 5646687763.

Controls are also listed Down Here

Space and left ctrlJump and crouchIn GameaAlt+EscapeShow CursorIn GameW S A DMoveIn Game

Don't Go On Me . It Can Be ANYWHERE!!
